ingredients.ingredient: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in 1-inch chunks
2 medium Vidalia or other sweet onions, cut in 1-inch chunks
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

cookingTips: Cut vegetables into uniform 1-inch chunks for consistent cooking time
Toss with oil, thyme, salt, and pepper before roasting for even seasoning
Add amaretto halfway through cooking to caramelize and add depth without burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the amaretto liqueur enhance the natural sweetness of both the potatoes and onions without overwhelming the dish?
